law.catch_line: A member of the Senate of Maryland shall administer the oath required by Article I, § 9 of the Mary...

section.section: A member of the Senate of Maryland shall administer the oath required by Article I, § 9 of the Maryland Constitution to the President of the Senate.
The President of the Senate shall administer the oath required by Article I, § 9 of the Maryland Constitution to the other members and officers of the Senate of Maryland.
A member of the House of Delegates shall administer the oath required by Article I, § 9 of the Maryland Constitution to the Speaker of the House of Delegates.
The Speaker of the House of Delegates shall administer the oath required by Article I, § 9 of the Maryland Constitution to the other members and officers of the House of Delegates.

text.section: The members of the General Assembly shall subscribe the oath that the members take under subsections (a) and (b) of this section.
